title: Donations and Contact
content:
Hi

Why does Thunderbird want all my personal information.......??

I'd be MORE THAN happy to make a donation to support you guys, but I am NOT happy about all the info I have to provide - and frankly I'm bot going to be bullied into giving info I don't want to. I donate to Wikipedia and they don't ask such intrusive questions - so why do you? You say that less than 2% of TB users donate - this PROBABLY the reason why they don't...!

And the fact that there is no direct link to ask somebody ask question about this subject, is really frustrating.

Thanks
creator: minkwa1

title: Can't Stop Firefox from Reloading Crashed Session
content:
The problem is that even after I've tinkered with the about:config settings to prevent Firefox from restoring my previous session after a crash, it just won't listen! The changes I make in about:config don't seem to save, and every time Firefox crashes, it happily reloads my old tabs and windows.

Your assistance would be greatly appreciated!

OS: Arch Linux DE: Gnome 44
creator: anonisanon

title: Firefox asks to save passwords it already has saved
content:
TLDR: Firefox offers me to save the credentials that are already saved.

I have saved passwords on Firefox. In order to log into my email, I use the saved log in credentials (which means I do not need to type out the credentials). It allows me to sign in, as expected, except that it asks me to save (again) the credentials, as if I have filled in the credentials manually for the first time.

I have Firefox 117.0 on Windows 11 computer.

Thank you.
creator: praneshbhargava

title: can't complete account verification, no cell phone, keep running out of time, eetc. help!
content: I need foxfire to get my emails but haven't been able to verify account... I don't have a cell phone. I used to get emails from Microsoft Edge but can't since recent update. Help, I live alone, am disabled and retired. Thanks, Diana [removed pone# from public support forum]
creator: dimonesq
